title: Authors and Citation
text: White RA (2022). spldb: abstracted system easily working databases large datasets. https://docs.sykdomspulsen./spldb/, https://github.com/sykdomspulsen-org/spldb.
code: @Manual{,   title = {spldb: An abstracted system for easily working with databases with large datasets},   author = {Richard Aubrey White},   year = {2022},   note = {https://docs.sykdomspulsen.no/spldb/, https://github.com/sykdomspulsen-org/spldb}, }

title: An abstracted system for easily working with databases with large datasets
text: spldb provides abstracted system easily working databases large datasets. Read introduction vignette run help(package="spldb").

title: An abstracted system for easily working with databases with large datasets
text: splverse set R packages developed help solve problems frequently occur performing infectious disease surveillance. want install dev versions (access packages haven’t released CRAN), run usethis::edit_r_profile() edit .Rprofile. write : Save file restart R. can now install splverse packages drat repository.
code: options(   repos = structure(c(     SPLVERSE  = "https://docs.sykdomspulsen.no/drat/",     CRAN      = "https://cran.rstudio.com"   )) ) install.packages("spldb")
